references.paper_title: Nerffaceediting: Disentangled face editing in neural radiance fields
references.reason: It is the backbone of the FFaceNeRF model and is extensively used for disentangled appearance and geometry representation.
FFaceNeRF is built upon EG3D, and it provides the foundation for geometry-aware 3D generative models used in FFaceNeRF.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: The generator architecture is a style-based generator which is known to contain coarse-to-fine details through the early to later layers of the generator.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) are the foundation for representing scenes and enabling view synthesis, which is crucial for 3D face editing.

references.paper_title: Bisenet: Bilateral segmentation network for real-time semantic segmentation
references.reason: It is used for semantic segmentation and is used for pre-trained face segmentation network [49].
